name: the one where Ricardo wants to see the personal information of an owner with pets and visits using the Web application
scenarioId: classpath:features/owners/manage_owners:the one where Ricardo wants to see the personal information of an owner with pets and visits using the Web application
methodName: the one where Ricardo wants to see the personal information of an owner with pets and visits using the Web application

testSteps.description: Given Ricardo wants to see the personal information of Jean Coleman using the Web application

children.description: Ricardo navigates to the all owners page
Ricardo navigates to the welcome page
Ricardo opens the browser at http://localhost:32770
Ricardo clicks on the Owners menu
Ricardo clicks on the All Owners button
Ricardo filters the owners table with the search filter: Jean
Ricardo enters 'Jean' then hits [ENTER] into 'Search Filter' field

testSteps.description: When he selects the owner in the Owners page
Then he should see the registered information of Jean Coleman

reportData.title: Expected Owner Information

children.description: For Ricardo: Then the displayed owner personal information should contain the information of Jean Coleman

userStory.storyName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the owners information
userStory.displayName: The Pet Clinic should allow to manage the owners information
userStory.narrative:
As a VetClinic Manager
  I would like to be able to manage the owners information
  In order to handle all the pets and visits made by them

title: the one where Ricardo wants to see the personal information of an owner with pets and visits using the Web application
description: Jean Coleman is an owner registered in the system with pets and visits

rule.name: The system should allow to access the personal information of an owner
